description.value: A creature subjected to Oil of Taggit must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or have the Poisoned|XPHB condition for 24 hours. The creature also has the Unconscious|XPHB condition while Poisoned|XPHB in this way. It wakes up if it takes damage.

_srdData.name: Oil of Taggit
entries: A creature subjected to Oil of Taggit must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or have the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition for 24 hours. The creature also has the {@condition Unconscious|XPHB} condition while {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} in this way. It wakes up if it takes damage.
